input.sentences: too bad their lazy son would n't help them .
they needed help with the fruit .
they provided him a place to live still .
he wo n't get any pie .
output.sentences: Fall had arrived so it was time to harvest our garden.
Harvesting isn't so bad and is usually a family event but this year our son decided to be lazy relax by the sea.
Since he's not going to help I told him he wasn't going to enjoy the the things I make with the fresh fruit.
Gardening has provided us with the food we need to live more self-sustaining lives.
Needless to say our son was filled with woe as he watched us dig in to the delicious pie made with our harvested fresh fruit.
